Package com.marzapower.loggable

Class Summary
Log This is the global Logger factory class.
LoggerContainer The Logger container class.
 

Enum Summary
Loggable.LogLevel This is the collection of the available custom log levels for the Loggable annotation
 

Annotation Types Summary
Loggable This interface will define a class that can access the global logging capabilities.
